languages.text: {n}Абеляр задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Это так. Они должны быть готовы к этому, и я хочу верить, что они смогут сами позаботиться о себе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр задумчиво кивает.{/n} "Это так. Они должны быть готовы к этому, и я хочу верить, что они смогут сами позаботиться о себе".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはうなずいて、深く考え込む。{/n}「仰るとおりです。一族は備えるべきです。皆、うまく取り計らってくれると思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはうなずいて、深く考え込む。{/n}「仰るとおりです。一族は備えるべきです。皆、うまく取り計らってくれると思います」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德点了点头，陷入沉思。{/n}“您说得对。他们得做好准备，我也希望能相信，下一次他们能够自己解决问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德点了点头，陷入沉思。{/n}“您说得对。他们应该做好准备，我也希望能相信，下一次他们能够自己解决问题。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard acquiesce, l'air perdu dans ses pensées.{/n} « C'est vrai. Ils doivent s'y préparer, et j'aimerais pouvoir croire qu'ils sont capables de gérer ce genre de situation sans moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard acquiesce, l'air perdu dans ses pensées.{/n} « C'est vrai. Ils doivent s'y préparer, et j'aimerais pouvoir croire qu'ils sont capables de gérer ce genre de situation sans moi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard asiente ensimismado.{/n} «Cierto. Deben estar preparados para ello y quiero creer que serán capaces de cuidar de ellos mismos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard asiente ensimismado.{/n} «Cierto. Deben estar preparados para ello y quiero creer que serán capaces de cuidar de ellos mismos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard nickt gedankenverloren.{/n} "Das ist wahr. Sie sollten darauf vorbereitet sein, und ich will glauben, dass sie alleine zurechtkommen werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nickt gedankenveloren.{/n} "Das ist wahr. Sie sollten darauf vorbereitet sein, und ich will glauben, dass sie alleine zurechtkommen werden."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Düşüncelere dalan Abelard, başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız. İhtiyatlı olmaları gerek. Ben de kendi başlarının çaresine bakabilmelerini isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods, deep in thought.{/n} "That is true. They need to be prepared for it, and I want to believe that they will be able to take care of themselves."
